short_summary: The Department of National Defence seeks proposals to obtain the items listed below.
description: The tender is for multiple Victoria-Class Spares with the requested items to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.
full_summary:
刊文翻訳(eng)

### Expired Tender Notice

**Reference Number**: PW-22-01006467

**Solicitation Number**: W8482-230617/A

**Tender Closing Date**: 2022-11-25T14:00:00 (Closed)

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**

The Department of National Defence (DND) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of various spares required for vessels. The following items are listed under GSIN codes and quantities:

#### List of Required Items

| GSIN Code | Description | Quantity | Unit of Issue | Delivery Location |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| N6685 | Pressure Gauge | 4 EA | CFB Esquimalt |  |
| |  | 3 EA | CFB Halifax |  |
| N5310 | Flat Washer | 12 EA | CFB Esquimalt |  |
| |  | 8 EA | CFB Halifax |  |
| N5310 | Fluid Pressure Filter Parts Kit | 12 EA | CFB Esquimalt |  |
| |  | 8 EA | CFB Halifax |  |
| N5331 | O-Ring | 4 EA | CFB Esquimalt |  |
| |  | 3 EA | CFB Halifax |  |
| N4310 | Valve Assembly | 25 EA | CFB Esquimalt |  |
| |  | 15 EA | CFB Halifax |  |
| N2530 | Governor Assembly | 7 EA | CFB Esquimalt |  |
| |  | 4 EA | CFB Halifax |  |

**Trade Agreements**: This solicitation is subject to the trade agreements specified below:

| Trade Agreement | Country |
| --- | --- |
| Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement | Honduras |
| Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) | Korea |
| Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement | Panama |
| Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement | Colombia |
| Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) | Canada |
| Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA) | Chile |

**Contact Information**

| Contact Person | Email | Phone |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Cassandra Leach | cassandra.leach@forces.gc.ca | 999-999-9999 |

该文的翻译仍是上述文档
